alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:06PM CDT until June 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR WESTERN MOORE AND SOUTHEASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Channing, or 23 miles southwest of Dumas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Channing, Masterson and Four Way. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
